name: lightmaze.
description:
lightmaze.

Move with WASD keys.  

Assignment: create a maze game with a sense of danger for the player, whether through a timer or enemies.  Game features a randomly-generated maze that changes halfway through to suit the shift in gameplay and allow for more space when avoiding enemies.

GAM 606, MFA in Game Development at the Academy of Art University.   
Effects via Archanor FX on the Unity Asset Store.  Maze generation code via catlikecoding.com.

Further information available at onewinter.net.
